The 2018 Queensland Reds season was the club's 22nd season since the inception of Super Rugby in 1996.
Squad
Current squad
The Queensland Reds squad for the 2018 season:.}} Aidan Toua and Ruan Smith were not initially included in the squad, but was subsequently added.}}}}.}}.}}
